channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Beeper’s all-in-one messaging app relaunches with an on-device model and premium upgrades
item.description: Multi-service messaging app Beeper, which allows people to connect to all their chat apps from one interface, is relaunching its app on Wednesday to o...

item.title: OpenAI and Anthropic researchers decry ‘reckless’ safety culture at Elon Musk’s xAI
item.description: The criticisms follow weeks of scandals at xAI that have overshadowed the company's technological advances.

item.title: ElliQ Review: An AI Companion Bot for Lonely Elders
item.description: The AI-powered ElliQ robot and smart display aim to improve life for older folks living alone.

item.title: Watch Our Livestream Replay: Inside the AI Copyright Battles
item.description: Curious about generative AI and copyright? On July 16, our writers answered your questions about this critical topic.

item.title: Scale AI lays off 14% of staff, largely in data-labeling business
item.description: Scale AI is cutting 14% of the company just weeks after Meta invested $14.3 billion in the startup and hired away its CEO.

item.title: Can US Measles Outbreaks Be Stopped?
item.description: The US almost lost its measles elimination status once. Lessons from that episode suggest it will be more difficult to avoid doing so now.

item.title: DHS Faces New Pressure Over DNA Taken From Immigrant Children
item.description: The US government has added the DNA of approximately 133,000 migrant children and teens to a criminal database, which critics say could mean police tr...

item.title: GM teams up with Redwood Materials to power data centers with EV batteries
item.description: GM will send batteries — new and old — to Redwood Materials, which will assemble them into large packs capable of supporting data centers and the grid...

item.title: Dyneema’s New Fiber Composite Is Lighter, Stronger, and More Durable Than Ever
item.description: Hyperlite Mountain Gear and Dyneema collaborate on lighter, more durable hiking backpacks, which lets you put even more Dyneema on your Dyneema.

item.title: India eyes global quantum computer push — and QpiAI is its chosen vehicle
item.description: QpiAI, an Indian startup that integrates AI and quantum computing for enterprise use cases, has raised $32 million in a new funding round co-led by th...
